text: These Truths: A History of the United States is a book of American history by historian Jill Lepore. It traces histories of American politics, law, society, and technology from the Age of Discovery through the present day. These Truths was published by W. W. Norton in September 2018. == Further reading == * * * * * * * * * * * == External links == * Category:2018 non-fiction books Category:American history books Category:History books about the United States Category:English-language books Category:W. W. Norton & Company books
title: These Truths
